name: The Billy Bopper
description:
2D platformer about a Ninja who loves to bop Billies!

- Collect all the Tacos and KEKWs around the map!
- Use your Daggers to BOP all the BILLIES!!
- Avoid the Pits, or else you'll be QUICK DEAD!!!
- Grab the AlixxaLoves to gain a life.

W A S D - for movement
SPACE - throw dagger

Happy Birthday, Alina! 

www.twitch.tv/alixxa
